block.p: In the following reports, the listed at price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent list
Number of bedrooms Number of full bathrooms Number of half bathrooms Weeks on market
*Sale in this price category not available.

820-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, George Washington Bridge view; maintenance $723, 38% tax deductible; listed at $290,000. Broker: Edel Family Management.
425-sq.-ft. studio condo in a renovated prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, h/w floors, terrace; common charge $580; taxes $696 (abated); listed at $535,000. Broker: Citi Habitats.
695-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, h/w floors, c/a; common charge $418; taxes $4,500; listed at $630,000. Broker: Halstead Property.

1,150-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, renovated kitchen and baths, washer/dryer, original detail; maintenance $1,894, 60% tax deductible; listed at $1.225 million. Broker: Corcoran.
2,845-sq.-ft. penthouse duplex condo in a year-old building; windowed kitchen, fireplace, den, terrace; common charge $1,672; taxes $20,496; listed at $5.975 million. Brokers: Corcoran; Eychner.

850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining area, windowed eat-in kitchen, renovated bath, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $662, including electricity, 50% tax deductible; listed at $299,000. Broker: Citi Habitats.
54-year-old brick and wood contemporary; eat-in kitchen, sunroom, h/w floors, partly finished basement, 2-car garage, 50-by-105-ft. lot; taxes $3,290; listed at $599,500. Broker: Salmon.

97-year-old 2-family; primary unit: 2 bedrooms, 2 baths; other unit: 2 bedrooms, 1 bath; in each: dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, h/w floors; 38-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,000; listed at $779,000. Broker: Susan E. Goldy.

97-year-old town house; sunroom, pocket doors, stained-glass windows, parquet floors, finished English basement, original detail; 17-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,105; listed at $985,000. Broker: Warren Lewis.

87-year-old Tudor; renovated kitchen and baths, family room, den, office, fireplace, h/w floors, finished basement, 2-car garage, 40-by-98-ft. lot; taxes $5,582; listed at $1.499 million. Broker: Madeleine.

650-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a 42-year-old building; terrace with ocean view, sleeping alcove, h/w floors; maintenance $345, 65% tax deductible; $75 parking fee; listed at $239,000. Brokers: Topper Realty; Re/Max Shores.

54-year-old stone and brick Cape Cod; sunroom with door to deck, 2 bedrooms on 1st floor, 1-car garage, finished basement, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $7,800; listed at $499,000. Brokers: Atanas; Jan Kalman.

81-year-old center-hall colonial; living-room fireplace, h/w floors, full basement, finished attic, deck, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $9,213; listed at $719,000. Brokers: Prudential Douglas Elliman; Daniel Gale Sotheby's.

71-year-old brick colonial; entry hall, fireplaces in living room and den, updated master bath, 2-car garage, 70-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $11,497; listed at $975,000. Brokers: Daniel Gale Sotheby's; Century 21 Laffey.

14-year-old postmodern; 2-story entry, master suite with marble bath and sitting area, fireplace, finished full basement, den, 2-car garage, 0.25-acre lot; taxes $21,553; listed at $1.449 million. Broker: Shawn Elliott.
114-year-old 2-story brick with 4 apartments, 3 with 2 bedrooms each and the other with 1 bedroom; front porch; 0.1-acre lot; taxes $4,390; listed at $449,900. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Residential.
26-year-old colonial; living-room fireplace, large eat-in-kitchen, screened porch, cathedral ceilings, 0.5-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $13,629; listed at $619,000. Broker: Prudential Rand.

77-year-old Tudor; stone turret with Juliet balcony, stone fireplace in living room, breakfast room, slate roof, 0.17-acre lot; taxes $12,418; listed at $795,000. Brokers: Houlihan Lawrence; Houlihan & O'Malley.

New colonial; 9-foot ceilings, 2-story entry, family-room fireplace, h/w floors, marble baths, 0.25-acre lot, taxes not yet assessed; listed at $1.095 million. Brokers: Nan Mar Holdings; Houlihan Lawrence.

19-year-old colonial; pillared front porch, grand entry hall, living-room fireplace, cook's kitchen, 3-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $26,201; listed at $1.995 million. Brokers: Realty 3; Houlihan Lawrence.

50-year-old cedar ranch; eat-in kitchen, marble fireplace, h/w floors, circular drive, 1-car garage, 2-acre lot with gazebo and access to reservoir; taxes $5,402; listed at $300,000. Broker: Weichert.

40-year-old wood colonial; upgraded appliances, bay window, family room, h/w floors, walk-in closet, deck, 2-car garage, 126-by-142-ft. lot; taxes $10,987; listed at $494,900. Brokers: Coldwell Banker New City; Joyce.

9-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; family room, fireplace, office, cathedral ceilings, new security system, 2-car garage, 3-acre lot; taxes $14,600; listed at $794,000. Brokers: Regal Homes & Properties; Prudential Rand.

20-year-old brick and stucco Tudor; 3 family rooms, fireplace, cathedral ceilings, wall of windows, h/w floors, deck, 2-car garage, 0.61-acre lot; taxes $16,309; listed at $939,000. Brokers: Prudential Rand; Joyce.

2,000-sq.-ft. penthouse condo in a 5-year-old building; family room, 2 master suites, marble baths; common charge $1,355; taxes $21,870; listed at $1.55 million. Brokers: Joyce; Re/Max Preferred Properties.
18-year-old condo; 1st-floor unit, porch, master suite w/walk-in closet, fireplace, c/a, assigned parking space; common charge $156; taxes $3,637; listed at $239,900. Broker: Davis Realtors.

51-year-old vinyl-sided split-level; new furnace and c/a, deck, recreation room, security system, 1-car attached garage, 0.15-acre lot; taxes $7,692; listed at $374,5000. Brokers: Jordan Baris; Better Homes N.J.

81-year-old colonial; completely renovated in 2003, living-room fireplace, finished full basement, finished attic, 0.1-acre lot; taxes $11,327; listed at $599,000 (multiple bids). Brokers: Jordan Baris; Burgdorff ERA.

11-year-old center-hall colonial; eat-in island kitchen, master bedroom suite w/sitting room, family-room fireplace, attached 2-car garage, 1.8-acre lot; taxes $15,190; listed at $1 million. Broker: Weichert.

New Craftsman-style colonial; ornate woodwork throughout, high ceilings, cook's kitchen w/island, 3 fireplaces, patio, 0.3-acre lot; taxes $27,226; listed at $1.99 million. Brokers: Stanton; Coldwell Banker.

107-year-old legal 2-family being used as a 1-family; upgraded appliances, den, h/w floors, updated electricity and plumbing, 0.2-acre lot; taxes $3,258; listed at $269,000. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

880-sq.-ft. 30-year-old town-house condo; dining room, windowed kitchen, office, balcony; common charge $340; taxes $2,316; listed at $475,000. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Greenwich; Prudential Connecticut.

38-year-old wood raised ranch; family-room fireplace, vaulted ceilings, deck, c/a, 2-car garage, 2.3-acre lot; taxes $9,526; listed at $725,000. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Wilton; Coldwell Banker Riverside-Shavell.

43-year-old brick and wood raised ranch; front porch, foyer, family room, fireplace, c/a, deck, 0.76-acre lot; taxes $6,746; listed at $949,900 (multiple bids). Brokers: Weichert; Coldwell Banker Greenwich.

50-year-old wood colonial; bay window in kitchen, family room, den, 3 fireplaces, guest suite, exercise room, pool, 2-acre lot; taxes $17,638; listed at $1.595 million (multiple bids). Broker: Prudential Connecticut.
